thirsty.translation[0].definitions[0].de: feeling that you want or need a drink
thirsty.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Can I have a glass of water? I’m really thirsty.
He’d been working in the garden and was very hot and thirsty.
All this digging is thirsty work  (=work that makes you want a drink).
thirsty.translation[0].definitions[1].de: having a strong desire for something
thirsty.translation[0].definitions[2].de: fields or plants that are thirsty need water
